title: Lava Spills Onto Private Property In Hawaii, Closing In On Homes
teaser: Lava has been flowing toward the small town of Pahoa on Hawaii's Big Island since June and is oozing closer to dozens of homes. Renee Montagne speaks to Hawaii Public Radio's Molly Solomon about the eruption and how prepared residents are.
contentencoded: Copyright 2014 NPR. To see more, visit http://www.npr.org/.
